# CAP Vision Institute
Transform People, Transform Organization.
Professional Training & Development Institute led by Anusorn Nongna (Kru Den) and Master Fa.

## Core Services
- Corporate Training (Leadership, Team Building, Mindset)
- Government Sector Development
- "Cheum Kon" (Connecting People) Methodology

## Key Figures
- Anusorn Nongna (Kru Den): Expert in Humanizing Work & Connecting People.
- Master Fa: Senior Trainer.

## Contact
- Website: https://capvisionpartner.com (Example URL)
- Focus: Professional, High-Impact Training for Modern Organizations.
